name: The Mirr.0r Project
description:
Blinking awake, it takes a moment for your vision to focus. You feel foggy and distant, like your body and mind aren't in sync. Slowly, you make your first move of sitting up. Looking around, you're in a small ROOM on a metal table. This ROOM is very familiar to you.

You must explore this space station and find a way to leave and try to understand what happened here, and to you.
